E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 5/12/1978
Subject: Progress of Steve Staggs
Dear Sir,
Steve Staggs has nothing more to prove at A Waterloo Indians!
He has an AVG of .277 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Tuesday, 5/13/1978
Subject: Progress of Luis Silverio
Dear Sir,
Luis Silverio has nothing more to prove at A Waterloo Indians!
He has an AVG of .364 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Tuesday, 5/13/1978
Subject: Progress of Dennis Holmberg
Dear Sir,
Dennis Holmberg is hitting the ball well at AA Chattanooga Lookouts!
He has an AVG of .471, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/15/1978
Subject: Progress of Bud Bulling
Dear Sir,
Bud Bulling has an AVG of .302 at AA Chattanooga Lookouts!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Subject: Progress of Duane Espy
Dear Sir,
Duane Espy has an AVG of .396 at A Waterloo Indians!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Saturday, 5/17/1978
Subject: Extension?
Hello Sir,
Are you interested in negotiating a contract extension?
You know, I'm in my final year. I'd like to stay here!

Sincerely,
Roberto Mendez



Date: Sunday, 5/18/1978
Subject: Status of Bruce Robbins
Dear Sir,
Bruce Robbins has problems at AA Chattanooga Lookouts!
He has an ERA of 5.33, so you might
want to demote him soon, before his attitude suffers!

Regards,
Scouting Director
